content:
This is about the right exactness of tensor products.
It does three minor modifications:

  • One hypothesis is generalized (from AddCommGroup to AddCommMonoid), without any change
  • Some namespaces are changed, docs#rTensor.surjective becomes LinearMap.rTensor_surjective, and similar other changes
  • Two lemmas are added that compute the #LinearMap.range of docs#LinearMap.rTensor and docs#LinearMap.lTensor (they follow easily from docs#rTensor.surjective and docs#lTensor.surjective).
